Section.Catchline: Escapes from secure detention or residential commitment facility.

Subsection.Text: Any secure detention facility maintained for the temporary detention of children, pending adjudication, disposition, or placement;

Any residential commitment facility described in s. 985.03(46), maintained for the custody, treatment, punishment, or rehabilitation of children found to have committed delinquent acts or violations of law; or
Lawful transportation to or from any such secure detention facility or residential commitment facility,

SectionBody.Text: constitutes escape within the intent and meaning of s. 944.40 and is a felony of the third degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082, s. 775.083, or s. 775.084.
